listitem.para: Module housing peripherals initialisation, necessary dynamic allocation of memory. Creates thread listening to the terminal input. Calls run init game menu().
File, where user preferences can be set. For example maximum cap for lives, score gained by eating ghosts/coins can be set here.
File with definitions of data structures used across modules like fb data (data about next frame on the screeen), map data (data about currently played map)
Module with functions to draw shapes to the frame buffer.
Module with functions to draw shapes to the frame buffer.

Module with function draw final score that draws the final score to the screen and waits for user input. Returns true if the user pressed the s key and therefor wants to continue playing or the q key indicating he wants to end the program.

Module with function draw final score that draws the final score to the screen and waits for user input. Returns true if the user pressed the s key and therefor wants to continue playing or the q key indicating he wants to end the program.
Module where the game is taking place.
Module where the game is taking place.
Module where all the logic and movement of ghost is placed.
Module where all the logic and movement of ghost is placed.
Module for creating map for the screen from the templates in the form described in the map template.h.
File housing the definition of the template data structure Current maps: map star, map circles, map conch.
Module for rendering the map to the frame buffer. Houses function render map.
Module for rendering the map to the frame buffer. Houses function render map.
Module for drawing menu, setting game settings and starting the game.
Module for drawing menu, setting game settings and starting the game.
Module for setting the LCD screen and writing data to it.
Module for setting the LCD screen and writing data to it.
Module for mapping the the peripheral adresses to the memory.
Module for mapping the the peripheral adresses to the memory.
Module for the controls and rendering of pacman.
Module for the controls and rendering of pacman.
Module housing the thread function for reading the terminal in nonblocking mode and setting the last key pressed variable.
Module housing the thread function for reading the terminal in nonblocking mode and setting the last key pressed variable.
Module for drawing text to frame buffer.
Module for drawing text to frame buffer.
